backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing news items in a map with functions to publish, remove, and fetch all news.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing language selector and language state/persistence features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router routes, React Query provider, and wraps the app with the LanguageProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing Swift Energy branding, attribution, and CK Education credit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, nav links, mobile menu, and a globe-based LanguageSelector.
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Reusable auto‑playing image carousel with hover pause and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Dropdown menu allowing users to pick a language and showing the current selection.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/context/LanguageContext.tsx: Provides language state, available languages list, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on authentication state and initializes access control when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Simple hook that returns the current language context and throws if used outside a LanguageProvider.
frontend/src/hooks/useNews.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, publish, and remove news entries via an actor, with cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode overrides, and utility styles including a grid background pattern.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with an image slider, team goals, vision, values, and member profiles.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays the team’s history with an image slider and a timeline of milestones.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section, team introduction, and a list of core values with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx: Renders an innovations page with an image slider, hero section, and cards describing three innovation projects.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/newsManagementFlow.ts: Defines the reducer, state, and actions for managing the PIN, add, and remove flows in the news management UI.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Implements the news page with image slider, news listing, and admin PIN‑gated flow for adding or removing news using a reducer state machine.
frontend/src/utils/newsDate.ts: Validates month/day/year inputs and converts them into a bigint nanosecond timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS customization including colors, containers, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing language selector features, and a pending request to add a globe‑icon language menu with multiple supported languages. Includes architectural notes, versions, and project configuration details.
